document_data.name: Joroelner Gleddyn
document_data.mainbody: King '''Joroelner Gleddyn''' was the ruler of the isolated [[halfling]]<ref group="note">The source for this article predates the ''[[Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting 3rd edition]]'' by more than a year, but the description of these reclusive hin is similar to the [[ghostwise halfling]]s introduced in that book. realm of [[Delmyr]], ''circa'' the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].{{Cite dragon/269/The New Adventures of Volo: Hin Nobody Knows|85}}
document_data.Personality: The vast majority of his subjects loved him.
document_data.Relationships:
He had a wife, Queen [[Samrasta Gleddyn|Samrasta]], and three daughters. The eldest was [[Barasra Gleddyn|Barasra]], the middle child was [[Tchalaedra Gleddyn|Tchalaedra]], and the youngest was [[Esmrela Gleddyn|Esmrela]].

Joroelner's rival and main critic was the baron of the [[Mazron family]], [[Guldin Mazron|Guldin "Strombrow" Mazron]].
document_data.History: King Joroelner succeeded his father and was the second Gleddyn to sit on the throne after nearly a millennia of rule by the [[Parradyne family]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Gossips could not resist speculating about a long-lost member of the Parradynes returning to take the throne back from the Gleddyns.
